snippet: Keep your athletic look streamlined and street-ready with these five simple rules.
abstract: Keep your athletic look streamlined and street-ready with these five simple rules.
lead_paragraph: Spring 2012 marks the return of an athletic influence in beauty, with everyone from Alexander Wang and Proenza Schouler to Peter Pilotto and Giambattista Valli showcasing a take on the high-performance trend. You don't want to overexert yourself, though. Keep your look streamlined and street-ready with these five simple rules.
